Description:
Required skills to be successful:Job-specific skills:Proficient YARDI knowledge (Property Management Software)
Excellent understanding of Commercial & Retail Leasing Principles
Well-versed with financial modelling, variance analysis, management financial reporting
 Well-versed with revenue financial principles and Dubai real estate laws
Previous experience in preparation of Budget Strategic Packs, Monthly ForecastsBehavioural Competencies :• Ability to adhere to strict deadlines• Ability to work in a busy environment and display good composure whilst working under pressure with many deliverables• Agility in dealing with ad-hoc requests• Strong commercial acumen and business fluency in variance interpretation and commentary• Excellent communication skills in Business English (speaking & writingWhat equips you for the role:Minimum Qualifications and Knowledge:• Finance qualification desired but not mandatory• Strong analytical skills, expertise in Microsoft Office, particularly Excel and Power BI• Knowledge of using analytical tools and systems• Knowledge of Real Estate Industry, Commercial & Retail Property ManagementMinimum Experience:• The ideal candidate would possess 3-5 years’ experience in Retail / Financial / Real Estate analysis and financial reporting.Job Details
